concept.title: Kinesis Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The Kinesis Consumer origin reads data from Amazon Kinesis Streams.

conbody.p: Kinesis Consumer originovervieworiginsKinesis ConsumerWhen you configure Kinesis Consumer, you specify the Amazon Web Services connection information for your Kinesis cluster and the data format of source data.
The Kinesis Consumer origin can use multiple threads to enable parallel processing of data from the cluster.
You can optionally use a proxy to connect to Kinesis Streams.
When necessary, you can reset the origin for Kinesis Consumer pipelines, but be sure to review the requirements and guidelines before doing so.
